Subscription.Description: Application crashes, hangs and error reporting logs.
Subscription.Query: <QueryList><Query Id="1" Path="Microsoft-Windows-SMBServer/Audit"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-SMBServer/Audit">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-SMBServer'] and (EventID=3000)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="2" Path="System"><Select Path="System">*[System[(EventID=41 or EventID=1001 or EventID=4621)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="3" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4610 or EventID=4611 or EventID=4614 or EventID=4622 or EventID=4697)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="4" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4719 or EventID=4817 or EventID=4902 or EventID=4906 or EventID=4908 or EventID=4912 or EventID=4904 or EventID=4905)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="5" Path="Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational">*</Select><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell-DesiredStateConfiguration-FileDownloadManager/Operational">*</Select><Select Path="Windows PowerShell">*</Select></Query><Query Id="6" Path="Microsoft-Windows-PrintService/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-PrintService/Operational">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-PrintService'] and Level=4 and EventID=307]]</Select></Query><Query Id="7" Path="System"><Select Path="System">*[System[Provider[@Name='Service Control Manager'] and (Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3 or Level=4 or Level=0) and (EventID=7022 or EventID=7023 or EventID=7024 or EventID=7026 or EventID=7031 or EventID=7032 or EventID=7034)]]</Select><Select Path="System">*[System[Provider[@Name='Service Control Manager'] and (Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3 or Level=4 or Level=0) and (EventID=7045 or EventID=7040)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="8" Path="Application"><Select Path="Application">*[Application[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-SoftwareRestrictionPolicies'] and (EventID=865 or EventID=866 or EventID=867 or EventID=868 or EventID=882)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="9" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID >=4698 and EventID <=4702)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="10" Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-Gateway/Admin"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-Gateway/Admin">*</Select></Query><Query Id="11" Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-Gateway/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-Gateway/Operational">*</Select></Query><Query Id="12" Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-ClientUSBDevices/Admin"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-ClientUSBDevices/Admin">*</Select></Query><Query Id="13" Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-ClientUSBDevices/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-ClientUSBDevices/Operational">*</Select></Query><Query Id="14" Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-PnPDevices/Admin"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-PnPDevices/Admin">*</Select></Query><Query Id="15" Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-PnPDevices/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-PnPDevices/Operational">*</Select></Query><Query Id="16" Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-Printers/Admin"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-Printers/Admin">*</Select></Query><Query Id="17" Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-Printers/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-Printers/Operational">*</Select></Query><Query Id="18" Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-ServerUSBDevices/Admin"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-ServerUSBDevices/Admin">*</Select></Query><Query Id="19" Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-ServerUSBDevices/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-ServerUSBDevices/Operational">*</Select></Query><Query Id="20" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Forwarding/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Forwarding/Operational">*</Select></Query><Query Id="21" Path="Microsoft-Windows-WindowsUpdateClient/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-WindowsUpdateClient/Operational">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-WindowsUpdateClient'] and Level=2 and (EventID=19 or EventID=20 or EventID=24 or EventID=25 or EventID=31 or EventID=34 or EventID=35)]]</Select><Select Path="Setup">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Servicing'] and Level=0 and EventID=1009]]</Select></Query><Query Id="22" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=5632 or EventID=5633)]]</Select></Query></QueryList>
